attributes.action: get the Facebook groups showing hatred to the British and US Armed Forces, removed from the website.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are several hatred sites on the Social Networking site demanding that soliers are removed from the service, steralised, and other sickening things.
These brave Men and Women fight for our Government and our Country.
We CANNOT allow this to remain and it opens the door up to all kinds of anti-forces propganda.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
